actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: A bill requiring the Secretary of Agriculture to notify applicants for certain emergency and operating loans of the approval or disapproval of such application within 60 days of receipt of the application.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and the Emergency Agricultural Credit Adjustment Act of 1978 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to notify applicants for operating and economic emergency loans of the approval or disapproval of an application within 60 days of its receipt. States that failure to so notify shall be considered loan approval, unless there are no remaining unobligated loan funds.

titles.title: A bill requiring the Secretary of Agriculture to notify applicants for certain emergency and operating loans of the approval or disapproval of such application within 60 days of receipt of the application.
